articles.author: Peter Marsh
articles.title: Joe Biden issued executive orders to control 'ghost guns'. It's not his first time tackling America's gun violence problem - ABC News
articles.description: After seven mass shooting in 2021, US President Joe Biden announces new executive orders targeting gun control. But the road to more action will be difficult.
articles.content:
On the day before US President Joe Biden announced new gun control measures, the US recorded its seventh mass shooting for 2021.
The plans to announce the new measures were already in place before a… [+7961 chars]
